A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A better \"movie\" than any of the other Star Wars movies and this review is being written after seeing Episode IX. The only Star Wars movie that solidly expresses it's theme. As a sequel it succeeds by expanding on the world and intentionally rejecting the same old tropes regurgitated by the previous movies (especially Episode VII). The only reason it isn't getting 5 stars from me is because of the opening bomber scene which doesn't make any sense at all.
